*Ejercicio 1*. 

```{r}
#A
library(readr)
matchesA <- read_csv("matchesA.csv")
```

```{r}
#B
media <- sum(matchesA$goldEarned)/length(matchesA$goldEarned)
#C
media2 <- mean(matchesA$goldEarned)
#D
sd <- sqrt(sum((matchesA$goldEarned-media)^2)/length(matchesA$goldEarned))
#E
sd2 <- sd(matchesA$goldEarned)
# No coincide porque usa el n-1 en vez de n. Lo podemos comprobar:
sd3 <- sqrt(sum((matchesA$goldEarned-media)^2)/(length(matchesA$goldEarned)-1))
```

*Ejercicio 4*

```{r}
BoosterPacksA <- read_csv("BoosterPacksA.csv")
c_comunes <- sum(BoosterPacksA$Com)
c_raras <- sum(BoosterPacksA$Rare)
c_raras_doradas <- sum(BoosterPacksA$gRare)
c_no_doradas <- sum(BoosterPacksA$Com)+sum(BoosterPacksA$Rare)+sum(BoosterPacksA$Epic)+sum(BoosterPacksA$Leg)
c_doradas <- sum(BoosterPacksA$gCom)+sum(BoosterPacksA$gRare)+sum(BoosterPacksA$gEpic)+sum(BoosterPacksA$gLeg)
c_totales <- c_no_doradas + c_doradas

prob_comunes <- c_comunes/c_totales
prob_raras <- c_raras/c_totales
prob_raras_doradas <- c_raras_doradas/c_totales
prob_no_doradas <- c_no_doradas/c_totales
prob_doradas <- c_doradas/c_totales
```

*Ejercicio 5*

```{r}
#A

#B
pbinom(3,30,prob_doradas)
#C

```
